::Grimmler::

Grimmler shakes his head at Necromancer's last question. "I doubt it. 
Optimus Prime is famous, yes, but too many Maximals have served under 
too many leaders for too much time. Although we might."

He stops at the hatch, giving Necromancer extra support to get up 
into the CF.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> "Jeez, who did you fight?" Grimmler asked
> 
> 
> "I feal like I fought a supernova and lost." Necromancer replied 
fealing a
> little groggy from the fight. he reached up and fealt a small cut 
on his
> head begin to drip. "It was the one they called Mobster. One of our 
friends
> were trying to fight him but couldn't compete so I stepped in." he 
tried to
> stand tall after referring to Razor Claws battle but found himself 
queezy
> from the strain. Thier conversation was interupted by a light and 
words from
> out of nowhere.
> . "Did you hear that?" Grimmler asked sounding both curious and 
surprised.
> 
> "Yes" Necromancer looked on in awe as the light became 
brighter "Does it
> truly mean that we finally have one leader?"
